<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>true</before>
        <description>Adding default topic change prompt message</description>
        <name>Swith Topic Prompt Message</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[setPromptMessage();

function setPromptMessage() {
    var gr = new GlideRecord('sys_cs_general_settings');
    gr.addQuery('sys_domain', 'global');
    gr.query();
    while (gr.next()) {
        gr.setValue('auto_select_prompt_message', "You'd like help with {Topic name}. Is that right?");
        gr.update();
    }
}]]></script>
